column5: Name changed to reflect move of Veterinary biomedical and clinical sciences into this broad field (from Other health).
Several GSS codes in this broad field split; in 2019 there were three GSS codes, and there are seven in 2020.
Multidisciplinary and interdisciplinary studies was split into four fields; the new CIP codes related to Data science and data analytics were added as their own GSS code in this broad field.
Human development was moved from Social sciences to Psychology; one GSS code was split.
Human development was moved from Social sciences to Psychology; several GSS codes were split out of Social sciences nec; reporting changes.
Added broad fields within Engineering for the first time. See table A-18b for field level changes in Engineering.

column4: Civil, environmental, transportation and related engineering fields
Electrical, electronics, communications and computer engineering
Industrial, manufacturing, systems engineering and operations research
Metallurgical, mining, materials and related engineering fields

column5: New CIP codes related to Clinical medical sciences were added as a new GSS code; changes to which codes can include graduate students.
Veterinary biomedical and clinical sciences moved from Other health to Agricultural and veterinary sciences. New GSS code split out of Other health, nec.
